Name: Witch of the Woods
About the game: In Witch of the Woods , you play as a witch who must gather ingredients in the forest in order to cast custom spells on the flora and fauna. Can you maintain the forest's ecosystem while fending off the corruption that is plaguing your woods? Witch of the Woods contains: Custom Spells A living ecosystem Different species of animals and plants In addition to the main game, there is an endless mode that lets you see how long you can last until the corruption takes over!
